lw3dge.graphics.models

Class TexturedModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.models.TexturedModel

  • public class TexturedModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a connection between a RawModel and a ModelTexture Credit to ThinMatrix and his OpenGL Tutorials
    Author:
    Jared Massa
    See Also:
    RawModel, ModelTexture

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Create a TexturedModel reference with a given model and texture
